nodes.text: Wishful Thinking was a Cracian thumper who raced at the Heatherdowns Hotel and Track. During a race that occurred while the Herglic merchant Hamar-Chaktak met with a group of Rebel agents regarding a bacta theft, bookmakers gave Wishful Thinking 5:2 odds. Hamar-Chaktak placed a 500 credit bet on the Cracian thumper.
